info.title: Payments
info.description: Offers a convenient way for consumers to create, modify and cancel payments, manage AutoPay subscriptions, and enable external bank accounts to source the payments towards their account balances

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Account ID

schema.description: Account ID

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Start date of date range which customer needs to view payments from

schema.description: Start date of date range which customer needs to view payments from

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: End date of date range which customer needs to view payments from

schema.description: End date of date range which customer needs to view payments from

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Payment Status to filter out the payments

schema.description: Payment Status to filter out the payments

parameters.name: paymentInitiationSource
parameters.description: Inititiation source of payments that could be internal, external or both

schema.description: Inititiation source of payments that could be internal, external or both

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page index

schema.description: Page index

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of items on each page

schema.description: Number of items on each page

parameters.name: X-Channel-Id
parameters.description: The channel that initiated the call. Must be passed through the API stack.

schema.description: The channel that initiated the call. Must be passed through the API stack.

parameters.name: Correlation-ID
parameters.description:
Unique end-to-end trace ID. The initiating system (such as a Channel or 
Batch Job), must generate this unique ID, then this must be passed 
through the API call stack. This is required to maintain compliance with the current Barclays REST Standard.

parameters.description: Unique TIAA-US External token

400.description:
The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed 
syntax. The client SHOULD NOT repeat the request without 
modifications.

401.description: The user could not be authenticated for this request.

500.description:
Server encountered an error processing request. This should not 
happen normally, but it is a generic error message, given when 
no more specific message is suitable.

404.description:
Server has not found a resource with that URI. This may be 
temporary and permanent condition. This status code is 
commonly used when the server does not wish to reveal 
exactly why the request has been refused, or when no other 
response is applicable.

401.description: The user could not be authenticated for this request.

500.description:
Server encountered an error processing request. This should not 
happen normally, but it is a generic error message, given when 
no more specific message is suitable.

404.description:
Server has not found a resource with that URI. This may be 
temporary and permanent condition. This status code is 
commonly used when the server does not wish to reveal 
exactly why the request has been refused, or when no other 
response is applicable.

503.description:
temporary maintenance of service, try again later. The implication 
is that this is a temporary condition which will be alleviated 
after some delay. If known, the length of the delay will be 
indicated in a Retry-After header. If no Retry-After is given, 
the client SHOULD handle the response as it would for a 500 response. 
Note: The existence of the 503 status code does not imply that a 
server will use it when becoming overloaded. Servers may simply 
refuse the connection.

AmountOptionsStatementBalance.title: AmountOptionsStatementBalance
AmountOptionsStatementBalance.description: Statement balance i.e. the amount owed by the customer till the last billing cycle

UpdateExternalAccountResponseData.title: UpdateExternalAccountResponseData
UpdateExternalAccountResponseData.description: update an external bank account response data

bankAccountId.description: ID of bank account added as payment source

paymentDate.description: Date on which processing of the payment started

authorizationText.description: Authorization text displayed on the payment confirmation screen
authorizationText.example: By selecting Make Payment, I authorize Barclays..

actionSubmittedTime.description: Timestamp when the submit button was clicked

status.description: Status describing if payment was added successfully

bankAccountId.description: ID of bank account added as payment source

status.description: Status describing if a subscription was added successfully

bankAccountNickname.description: Bank account nickname of the bank account added as payment source

bankAccountNumber.description: Encrypted Bank account number to be added as a payment source

bankRoutingNumber.description: Bank routing number of the bank account added as payment source

AddExternalAccountResponseData.title: AddExternalAccountResponseData
AddExternalAccountResponseData.description: add an external bank account response data

AmountOptionsCurrentBalance.title: AmountOptionsCurrentBalance
AmountOptionsCurrentBalance.description: Current balance i.e. total amount owed by the customer at the given moment

status.description: Status describing if a subscription was modified successfully

BankDetails.title: BankDetails

bankName.description: Bank name for the bank account

isValidBank.description: A boolean specifying if the bank is valid

BankDetails.description: Bank details for the bank account

AmountOptionsRemainingStatementBalance.title: AmountOptionsRemainingStatementBalance
AmountOptionsRemainingStatementBalance.description: Remaining statement balance if some part of it is already paid

errors.description: Contains one or more error messages and is mutually exclusive with the data item. This will not be returned in success scenarios.

status.description: Status describing if payment was added successfully

bankAccountId.description: ID of bank account added as payment source

bankAccountNickname.description: Bank account nickname of the bank account added as payment source

bankAccountNumber.description: Encrypted Bank account number to be added as a payment source

SchedulePaymentRequest.title: SchedulePaymentRequest

bankAccountId.description: ID of bank account added as payment source

paymentDate.description: Date on which processing of the payment started

authorizationText.description: Authorization text displayed on the payment confirmation screen
authorizationText.example: By selecting Make Payment, I authorize Barclays..

actionSubmittedTime.description: Timestamp when the submit button was clicked

SchedulePaymentRequest.description: Payment request data to Schedule a Payment

AmountOptionsMinimumDue.title: AmountOptionsMinimumDue
AmountOptionsMinimumDue.description: Minimum due amount that customer needs to pay

bankName.description: Bank name of the bank account added as payment source

bankNewRoutingNumber.description: Bank routing number of the bank account added as payment source

bankRoutingNumber.description: Bank routing number of the bank account added as payment source

paymentDate.description: Date on which processing of the payment started

AmountOptionsRemainingMinimumDue.title: AmountOptionsRemainingMinimumDue
AmountOptionsRemainingMinimumDue.description: Remaining minimum due amount if some part of it is already paid

AmountOptionsCreditLimit.title: AmountOptionsCreditLimit
AmountOptionsCreditLimit.description: Credit limit for the card account

bankAccountId.description: ID of bank account added as payment source

bankAccountNickname.description: Bank account nickname of the bank account added as payment source

bankAccountNumber.description: Encrypted Bank account number to be added as a payment source

DateOptionsCustomDateRange.title: DateOptionsCustomDateRange

fromDate.description: Start date of custom date range for future payments

toDate.description: End date of custom date range for future payments

DateOptionsCustomDateRange.description: Custom date range for future payments

dayOfMonth.description: Day of the Month on which the subscription was set up

daysBeforeDueDateToProcess.description: Days from Due Date from which the subscription was set up

repeatPayOptionType.description: The amount options customer can choose to pay for the subscription

GetAllExternalAccountsResponseData.title: GetAllExternalAccountsResponseData
GetAllExternalAccountsResponseData.description: All external bank accounts response data

bankAccountId.description: ID of bank account added as payment source

repeatPayOptionType.description: The amount options customer can choose to pay for the subscription

sessionLoginTime.description: Timestamp when the customer logged in

authorizationText.description: Authorization text displayed on the subscription confirmation screen
authorizationText.example: By selecting Create Subscription, I authorize Barclays..

actionSubmittedTime.description: Timestamp when the submit button was clicked

bankAccountNickname.description: Nickname for bank account added as payment source

bankAccountType.description: Account type of the bank account used as payment source

channel.description: Channel from which the payment was requested

isInternalPayment.description: Flag to specify if source of the payment was internal

paymentDate.description: Date on which processing of the payment started

requestedOn.description: Time at which the payment was requested

subscriptionId.description: Subscription ID if enrolled in AutoPay

id.description: Generated message identifier for particular request, helping to locate server logs.

code.description: Machine readable, unique code of the message related to particular case within operation execution.

title.description: Short description of the error. Not for displaying purposes.
title.example: The authorization credentials required for this request are invalid.

meta.description: Object containing non-standard meta-information about the error.
